name: Falcon Blade
description: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.
tips: It is one of the easiest pieces of equipment to build, but offering good attribute bonuses compared to its price.
Most heroes with an intention to stay long in the laning stage could consider this item, as it provides good attack damage and mana regeneration.
Should be sold in late game, if you are out of inventory slots for a more powerful equipment.
